2fa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
2fa.description: Send a code by email when you access from a new device or browser.
2fa.confirm_password_body: Enter your password to :action two-factor authentication.

devices.title: Trusted Devices
devices.description: List of devices you trusted after passing 2FA challenge.

sessions.title: Logout other sessions
sessions.description: Ends authenticated sessions on other browsers/devices.
